synopsis.text: Sousuke is a part-time worker living in a run-down apartment building owned by the kind and beautiful Yuki. One day, Sousuke hears creaking from his ceiling before it suddenly collapses, sending his upstairs neighbor Sunao crashing into his apartment. Though shaken, both escape unharmed, now finding themselves in an awkward yet intimate situation. Yuki promises to repair the damage, but with Sunao's apartment temporarily unlivable, she must find an inexpensive solution to house all three of them. Thus begins the chaotic story of Sousuke, Sunao, and Yuki attempting to comfortably cohabitate in the cramped apartments. Romantic tensions and hilarity ensue as the trio tries to settle into this unexpected living arrangement. Will new relationships blossom or will things fall apart? Find out in this quirky romantic comedy about a love triangle forced under one roof.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
